name: ax-mulcom
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(c0, cmul, c1), co(c1, cmul, c0)))
comment: Multiplication of complex numbers is commutative. Axiom 8 of 22 for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axmulcom . Proofs should normally use ~ mulcom instead. (New usage is discouraged.) (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.)
